bugs.description: The createPublicAccount handler assumes `postData.user` exists with `email`, `password`, and `fullname` fields. If the request body omits the `user` object or any of those properties, a TypeError will occur when accessing `postData.user.email`, causing an unhandled exception and a 500 response instead of proper validation.

The createPublicAccount handler assumes `postData.user` exists with `email`, `password`, and `fullname` fields. If the request body omits the `user` object or any of those properties, a TypeError will occur when accessing `postData.user.email`, causing an unhandled exception and a 500 response instead of proper validation.
